contents:
Type: movie
Title: Eternal Loop Day
Year: 1993
Genres: comedy fantasy time-loop
Description: A cynical weatherman is forced to relive the same small-town holiday over and over again until he learns to become a better person.

Type: movie
Title: Dream Thieves
Year: 2010
Genres: sci-fi heist thriller
Description: A team of specialists enters the dreams of business targets to steal secrets, but the leader is haunted by the memory of his wife and a tragic accident.

Type: movie
Title: Robot Child
Year: 2001
Genres: sci-fi drama
Description: In a future where androids can love, a lonely couple adopts a robotic boy who desperately wants to become real and win their affection.

Type: movie
Title: Cursed Tape
Year: 2002
Genres: horror mystery supernatural
Description: A journalist investigates a cursed videotape rumored to kill anyone who watches it seven days later, racing against time to save herself and her family.

Type: movie
Title: Dinosaur Park Catastrophe
Year: 1993
Genres: sci-fi adventure thriller
Description: A remote island theme park filled with cloned dinosaurs descends into chaos when security systems fail during a tropical storm.

Type: movie
Title: Shining Mountain Hotel
Year: 1980
Genres: horror psychological
Description: A writer takes a winter caretaking job at an isolated mountain hotel and gradually loses his sanity, threatening his wife and psychic son.

Type: movie
Title: Train to the Dead
Year: 2016
Genres: horror action zombies
Description: Passengers on a high-speed train must fight for survival when a viral outbreak turns people into fast-moving zombies during the journey.

Type: tv
Title: Desert Chemistry Teacher
Year: 2008
Genres: drama crime thriller
Description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer begins cooking illegal drugs in a van to secure his family's future, drawing a former student into the trade.

Type: tv
Title: Winter Crown Wars
Year: 2011
Genres: fantasy drama political
Description: Noble families scheme, wage war, and form uneasy alliances as they compete for control of an iron throne in a harsh medieval kingdom where seasons last for years.

Type: tv
Title: Paper Company Mockumentary
Year: 2005
Genres: comedy mockumentary workplace
Description: A documentary crew films the awkward and often absurd daily lives of employees at a mediocre paper sales company.

Type: anime
Title: Death Notebook
Year: 2006
Genres: thriller supernatural mystery
Description: A gifted student discovers a supernatural notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it, drawing the attention of a genius detective.

Type: anime
Title: Pirate Treasure Age
Year: 1999
Genres: adventure fantasy shonen
Description: A cheerful boy with a rubber body sails with a misfit crew to find the greatest treasure in the world and become king of the pirates.

Type: anime
Title: Hidden Leaf Orphan
Year: 2002
Genres: action ninja coming-of-age
Description: An energetic orphan boy with a dangerous spirit sealed inside him trains to become the leader of his ninja village and earn the respect of his peers.

Type: anime
Title: Angel Machine Pilots
Year: 1995
Genres: mecha psychological apocalyptic
Description: Traumatized teenagers pilot giant bio-mechanical weapons to fight mysterious beings attacking a futuristic fortified city.

Type: anime
Title: Spirit Bathhouse Girl
Year: 2001
Genres: fantasy coming-of-age
Description: A young girl becomes trapped in a world of spirits and must work in a magical bathhouse to free her parents and return to the human world.

Type: game
Title: Bonfire Curse Souls
Year: 2011
Genres: action rpg dark fantasy
Description: A silent undead warrior repeatedly resurrects at bonfires while exploring a ruined kingdom filled with cryptic lore and brutally difficult bosses.

Type: game
Title: Mall of the Dead
Year: 2006
Genres: action horror zombies
Description: Survivors barricade themselves inside a shopping mall and improvise weapons to fight off endless waves of zombies.

Type: game
Title: Fog Town Nightmare
Year: 1999
Genres: horror psychological mystery
Description: A parent travels to a foggy abandoned town in search of their missing child, facing monsters that seem to reflect guilt and trauma.

Type: game
Title: Mushroom Kingdom Rescue
Year: 1985
Genres: platformer adventure
Description: A mustached plumber jumps through colorful worlds, dodging enemies and collecting power-ups to rescue a captured princess from a turtle-like king.

Type: book
Title: Wizard School Boy
Year: 1997
Genres: fantasy young-adult
Description: A boy with a lightning-shaped scar learns he is a wizard and attends a secret magic school where he makes friends and confronts a dark sorcerer.

Type: book
Title: Ring of Dark Power
Year: 1954
Genres: fantasy epic adventure
Description: A timid hobbit inherits a cursed ring and must travel with companions to a volcanic mountain to destroy it before a dark lord regains his power.

Type: book
Title: Dragon Rider Farmboy
Year: 2002
Genres: fantasy rebellion coming-of-age
Description: A farm boy discovers a dragon egg and becomes a rider, joining a rebellion against a tyrannical emperor who controls other dragon riders.

Type: movie
Title: Alien Chest Horror
Year: 1979
Genres: sci-fi horror
Description: The crew of a commercial spaceship is hunted by a deadly alien that bursts from a man's chest after they investigate a mysterious distress signal.

Type: movie
Title: Talking Toys Jealousy
Year: 1995
Genres: animation family comedy
Description: A loyal cowboy toy fears being replaced when his owner receives a flashy space ranger action figure, leading to a rivalry and reluctant friendship.

Type: tv
Title: Strange 80s Kids
Year: 2016
Genres: sci-fi horror nostalgia
Description: In a small town during the 1980s, a group of kids uncovers a secret government lab, a girl with psychic powers, and a monster from another dimension.

Type: movie
Title: Casino Night Heist
Year: 2001
Genres: crime heist ensemble
Description: A charismatic thief assembles an eleven-person crew to rob multiple casino vaults in one night as revenge against a wealthy owner.

Type: tv
Title: Starship Exploration Crew
Year: 1987
Genres: sci-fi exploration ethics
Description: The crew of a starship explores new planets and encounters alien civilizations while debating moral dilemmas and the rules of a peaceful federation.

Type: podcast
Title: Small Town True Crime
Year: 2018
Genres: true-crime investigative documentary
Description: Hosts investigate an unsolved disappearance in a quiet rural town, interviewing locals and slowly uncovering buried secrets.

Type: music
Title: Lonely Astronaut Concept Album
Year: 2010
Genres: rock concept space
Description: A rock band tells the story of an astronaut drifting alone beyond the solar system, reflecting on isolation and lost connections back on Earth.

Type: movie
Title: Superhero Team Invasion
Year: 2012
Genres: superhero action crossover
Description: A billionaire in armor, a super soldier, a thunder god, and a spy join forces to repel an alien invasion orchestrated by a trickster god.
